scripts.start: npm run build && ARTSY_CLIENT_ID=8198312f86b95300946b ARTSY_CLIENT_SECRET=99ba69754592e7d4cce2bb319ece15b4 ARTSY_BASE_API_URL=https://stagingapi.artsy.net/api npm run server
scripts.test: npm run build && ARTSY_CLIENT_ID=8198312f86b95300946b ARTSY_CLIENT_SECRET=99ba69754592e7d4cce2bb319ece15b4 ARTSY_BASE_API_URL=https://stagingapi.artsy.net/api mocha --timeout 5000 dist/test
scripts.build: babel lib -d dist && babel test -d dist/test
scripts.action:autopreview: npm run action:config && npm run action:preview
